All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AssistantCard
This class it's part of the model and represents the assistant cards of the game.
AssistantCardAlreadyPlayedException
This class defines the exception that occurs when a player tries to play an assistant card that they already played
AssistantCardController
Controller class that handles the generation and the activation of assistant cards
AssistantCardNotFoundException
This class defines the exception that occurs when a player tries to play an assistant card that isn't in their hand
AssistantCardTest
JUnit tests for AssistantCard
AssistCard_Cmd_Msg
This class represents a command message, used when an assistant card is played.
Bag_Load_Msg
This class represents a load message, used when the bag needs to be loaded.
Bag_Tile
This class it's part of the model and represents the bag.
BagTest
Testing class for Bag
BoardPane
This class is an fxml component controller defining a player's school board
BoardRowPane
Controller class for custom fxml component BoardRowPane, which represents a row in a BoardPane
CharacterCard
This class it's part of the model and represents its character cards.
CharacterCardNotFoundException
This class defines the exception that occurs when a player tries to play a character card that can't be played
CharacterCardTest
Test class for CharacterCard
CharCard_Cmd_Msg
This class represents a command message, used when a character card is played.
CharCard_Load_Msg
This class represents a load message, used when the character cards need to be loaded.
CharCardController
Controller class that handles the generation and the activation of character cards
CharCardControllerTest
Test class for CharCardController
CharID
This enumeration class defines the different types of character cards and their behaviours
CharID.MemType
This is an enumeration defining the different types of memory a character card can have
ChooseCloud_Cmd_Msg
This class represents a command message, used when a Cloud_Tile has been chosen
CLI
Class that defines the command line view
Client
Main class for client instances
Cloud_Load_Msg
This class represents a load message, used when the cloud tiles need to be loaded.
Cloud_Tile
This class it's part of the model and represents its cloud tiles.
CloudPane
Controller class for custom fxml component CloudPane
CloudTest
Test class for Cloud_Tile
Coin_Load_Msg
This class represents a load message, used when the coins need to be loaded.
Colour
This Enum Class defines the different colours of the student disks/professor pawns.
ColourTest
Test class for Colour
Command_Message
This abstract class represents a generic command message
DiningRoomFullException
This class defines the exception that occurs when a player tries to insert a student disk in a row of the dining room that is full
DiskToDiningRoom_Cmd_Msg
This class represents a command message, used when a disk is moved to the dining room
DiskToIsland_Cmd_Msg
This class represents a command message, used when a disk is moved to an island
Eriantys
This class is a launcher wrapper that allows client cli, client gui and server to be run from the same main class
EriantysTest
Test class for main class Eriantys
ExceededMaxMovesException
This class defines the exception that occurs when a player tries to move mother nature further than what they actually can
Game
This class it's part of the model and represents the Game.
Game_Load_Msg
This class represents a load message, used when the game needs to be loaded.
GameIsOverException
This class defines the exception that is raised when the game is over
GameLoadException
This class defines the exception that occurs when there's an error while loading the game
GamePane
This class is a custom FXML component controller that represents a whole game
GameTest
Test class for Game
GUI
This class is the gui implementation of the view abstract class
GUI_ActionHandler
This class is the main GUI fxml controller
Info_Message
This class represents an Info message
InsufficientResourceException
This class defines the exception that occurs when a player isn't allowed to perform an operation due to a lack of resources
InvalidPlayerNumException
This class defines the exception that occurs when the number of players isn't valid
Island_Load_Msg
This class represents a load message, used when the islands need to be loaded.
Island_Tile
This class it's part of the model and represents its island tiles
IslandPane
Controller class for custom fxml component IslandPane
IslandTest
Test class for Island
Load_Message
This abstract class represents a generic load message
Lobby
This is the Lobby class.
LobbyClient
This class represent the Client and its interaction with the lobby.
LobbyClientDisconnectedException
This class defines the exception that occurs when a player disconnects
LobbyController
Controller class that handles a game lobby
LobbyControllerTest
Test class for lobby controller
LobbyEmptyException
This class defines the exception that occurs when the lobby is waiting for players to join the game, but no players are present in the lobby
LobbyListener
This class defines the listener for each client message stream towards the lobby
LoginPane
This class is a custom FXML component controller used to generate client Socket
Message
This abstract class represents a generic message
MessageCenter
This class is responsible for the generation of messages with its static method genMessage
MessageSender
This class provides a method to send messages for all fxml controller classes, to avoid duplicate code
MoveMotherNature_Cmd_Msg
This class represents a command message, used when mother nature is going to move
MoveNotAllowedException
This class defines the exception that occurs when a player tries to perform a move that is not allowed in the current state of the game
MsgType
This Enum Class defines all types of messages, defining the MsgType and its MainType.
MsgType.MainType
The MainType Enum describes if the MsgType is an Info message, a Load message or a Command message.
NotYourTurnException
This class defines the exception that occurs when a player tries to make a move when it's not their turn
Player
This class it's part of the model and represents its players
Player_Load_Msg
This class represents a load message, used when a player need to be loaded.
PlayerController
Controller class that handles players generation and player utilities function
PlayerControllerTest
Tets class for PlayerController
PlayerNotFoundException
This class defines the exception that occurs when a given player can't be found in the game's player list
PlayerPane
This class is a custom FXML component controller for a player
Players_Load_Msg
This class represents a load message, used when the players need to be loaded.
PlayerTest
Test class for Player
ReducedAssistantCard
This class is part of the reduced model and represents its assistant cards
ReducedBag
This class is part of the reduced model and represents its bag
ReducedCharacterCard
This class is part of the reduced model and represents its character cards
ReducedCloud
This class is part of the reduced model and represents its clouds
ReducedGame
This class is part of the reduced model and represents its game
ReducedGame.UpdateType
Enumeration class used to know which type of update is necessary
ReducedIsland
This class is part of the reduced model and represents its islands
ReducedPlayer
This class is part of the reduced model and represents its players
ReducedSchoolBoard
This class is part of the reduced model and represents its school boards
ReducedTurnState
This class is part of the reduced model and represents its turn states
SchoolBoard_Tile
This class it's part of the model and represents its school board tiles
SchoolBoardTest
Test class for SchoolBoard_Tile
Server
This is the server class
ServerCreationException
This class defines the exception that occurs when there is an error during the creation of the server
Team
This Enum Class defines the possible values of a Team.
Tile
This class it's part of the model, and it's an abstract class, representing an abstract Tile.
TileController
Controller class that handles islands, clouds and the movement of mother nature
TileControllerTest
Test class for TileController
TileEmptyException
This class defines the exception that occurs when a player tries to refill from an empty cloud
TileNotFoundException
This class defines the exception that occurs when a tile isn't found
TileTest
Test class for Tile
TurnManager
Controller class that handles players turn orders
TurnManager.TurnState
Inner enum class that defines different phases of the game
TurnState_Load_Msg
This class represents a load message, used when the turn state needs to be loaded.
UpdateGUIException
This class defines the exception that occurs when there is an error in the GUI update
View
This class defines a common interface for view classes CLI and GUI
WrongPhaseException
This class defines the exception that occurs when a player tries to perform an operation not allowed in the current phase of the game
